review: I was very happy with the Fire Stick for the first 3 months I owned it.  Today my grandchildren come over and they want to watch Nicelodeon and all of the streaming shows that were free before are now $2. All Disney streaming $2. Lets see the first (and only the first) season of Dora was free.  I am a Prime member and really not happy with the changes.  Seems like they suck you in with a great deal and then too bad we have now changed.
